item.title: How to write base cases
item.author: gsavitha@protonmail.com (Savitha Gollamudi)
item.description: This post requires knowledge of Recursion. If you are new here, its recommended to have a look at that post first. Many times, when it comes to recursion, we can guess the recursive solution but it becomes difficult to understand how to write proper base cases so that everything is handled and we do not get stack overflow(incase of java) or segmentation fault(incase of cpp) errors. What are base cases? Base cases are those inputs, for which we cannot further break down the problem into smaller sub problems.
